reviews.text: The food was acceptable but the manager Holly was very rude when taking our order. She had no patience and made us feel like we were third class citizens. I don't feel like returning.
Pizza and Vietnamese Coffee was great. Good option for a break or a meal before a movie.  Since is located across from the cinema.
Pizza is delicious but I thought the carbonara pasta tasted strange. Service was OK.

I met two super rude male staffs today. He didn’t stop when we were waving him, just ignore us and keep going his way. He was impatient as well when we ask for filling water. The two male staffs even ask my friend to walk to cashier for paying the bill. We paid extra 10% for service charge but I got totally no service! I tried the shop in central but I ever experienced such poor service. Blacklisted forever.

Didn't know it’s best pizza in town until read the review now. Bought here by a vegan colleague, ordered Four cheeses and Margherita.. Mamma Mia, crispy cheesy base, taste authentic and served everything nicely in order. Would definitely try pasta next time. Chill working lunch overlook ice rink in the busy shopping center.

result.vicinity: Unit UG-19, Festival Walk, 80 Tat Chee Avenue, Kowloon Tong

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 80號UG23號舖九龍, 又一城
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 80號UG23號舖九龍, 又一城
result.name: Exp

reviews.text: Love this restaurant,great quality of food,modern interior design,can look at ice skating while eating. The Korean style fried rice is very nice and a bit spicy. Buffalo chicken wings are good and also the deep dish pizza . Definitely a great restaurant
Food is not very good but the place and the waiters are nice
Spacious, but size and price of food don't match

Not gonna lie, this place serves the weirdest food that do not taste of anything.

Pizza: they literally slapped unrelated ingredients together and onto the dough in the most loveless way possible.

Udon: smoked duck is black for no reason, not being racist here. udon is bitter from the skin of the orange. onion tastes like rubber.

Juice: It was ok.
I had the apple kale yoghurt smoothie no sugar to go. It was not bad...had quite a strong apple taste. Will come back to try other flavors.

result.vicinity: UG23號舖, 80號, 九龍, 又一城, Tat Chee Avenue, Kowloon Tong

result.name: EXP

reviews.text: 厚皮pizza味道雖然比較簡單，但好吃，價錢實惠， 果汁是鮮榨，但沒有纖維不喜歡，温泉蛋肉醬意粉也不錯，只是坐位不太舒適

一定要多人敘餐，因每款食物份量也不小，分享齊食是理想的。
食物質素不差！特色是新鮮果汁飲品！
今晚比較忙，很多人，很趕，要90分鐘還抬，但食物超好味，員工十分落力，服務也不錯。
食物味道不錯，份量尚算多，但外圍環太嘈。

result.name: Ciao Chow* - Italian Cafeteria

reviews.text:
午市套餐的選擇不多，勝在意粉類別和薄餅類別的餸菜與餡料都可以自行選擇，適合大部分人的口味，不論是否素食者都可以選擇合心意的食物。
午市套餐的價位合理，只要主菜及飲品的話，98元便有交易，大約110元便可有沙律、主菜與飲品。然而，晚市的收費似乎頗高，若果質素與午市差不多的話便不太相宜，故首選午市惠顧。
另外，餐廳的裝潢布置簡單舒適，服務員的服態度良好、快速、有禮貌，而且上餐的速度很快，頗適合時間不足的人士。

上個月..閒日與友人晚間到又一城Ciao餐廳晚膳，選了5 款連甜品，近500元。首先🔸Stella Pizza~ 材料用量太小，中閰位置很疏落，星星形的角位有芝士，但可惜餅皮好韌🔹不容易咀嚼。另外蛋黃醬長通粉~冇乜特別味道(過淡)至於有嗀蜆肉 意粉~就非常之鹹, 簡單說 一係過淡 一係就超超鹹🌟希望 餐廳能著重出品，請認真地 控制食品的鹹淡程度，可以試味，但不要(求其 讓不合格的食品送到顧客枱上。Tiramisu~ 一試之後，發覺蛋糕太濕，入口就散開曬，就像將蛋糕放在水中，略帶咖啡味🔸食物名稱請加中文，字体亦太细，要顧及各年龄層。✨總括 唯一欣賞的是服務態度友善 ，至於食品，有不小進步空間，希望別讓失準的食品，令顧客卻步 ! 認真•努力吧 !
服務未達基本要求; 天花冷氣滴水，侍應只是叫客人移坐另一座位，無表歉意，亦無表示會安排修理。
The food was acceptable but the manager Holly was very rude when taking our order. She had no patience and made us feel like we were third class citizens. I don't feel like returning.
沙拉和意粉味道都不錯，咖啡的味道太淡了，跟喝冰水差不多。香港的餐廳對單獨用餐人士很不友善，在有2/3空檯的情況下被安排坐吧臺。餐牌食物的價錢應該是包括用餐環境的舒適度的。為甚麼大家都是選同一個餐牌但單獨用餐就要被安排在犄角旮旯呢？香港的餐廳文化真的滲透到每一間餐廳，不分貴賤。

result.vicinity: Unit UG-19, Festival Walk, 80 Tat Chee Avenue, Kowloon Tong
